snippet: Nicolas Batum had 24 points and 8 assists, and the Charlotte Hornets held off the visiting Nets, 116-111, on Wednesday night.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Charlotte Hornets defeat Brooklyn Nets, 116-111; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Nicolas Batum had 24 points and 8 assists, and the Charlotte Hornets held off the visiting Nets, 116-111, on Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: Nets Let Opportunities Slip in Push for Late Comeback
headline.main: Nets Let Opportunities Slip in Push for Late Comeback
